root.name: Ultimate Fighter
root.description: OVERVIEWUltimate fighter is a fighting game, develoed by Culture Brain and published by Natsume Co. LTD. Released on the Super Nintendo in 1993.GAMEPLAYUltimate fighter is an fighting game which contains single playerÂ mode and multiplayer mode while fighting you have the choice of selecting the following characters.Fighters: Rick,Kidou,Sawamura,Simon,Kazama,Rago,Earthquaker,Iorn Claw,Jake,Betty,Gosset,Fish, Anga,Lisa,Joe,Mushashi,Soma,Zebra,HugeHugh,Vajura,JakeSpinner,Falcon,Willy,Kates,Sanada,Leo, Grimzon,Chandler,Varna,and Dargon
